precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible with no active windows open.
action: Right Click on an empty area of the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: A context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop, showing options like 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'New', and 'Properties'.
expected_results: The context menu will close and the mouse cursor will change to an hourglass, indicating that the Display Properties window is loading.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will update to show the "Screen Saver" tab and its settings.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu currently displays "Windows XP".
action: Click the dropdown button of the "Screen saver" dropdown list.
expected_results: The dropdown list expands, displaying available screen saver options. The option "None" will be visible in the list.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open with the 'Screen Saver' tab selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'None' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become disabled. The dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible within the "Monitor power" section.
action: Click the "Power..." button in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open in front of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the drop-down arrow next to "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A list of time intervals will appear.

precondition: The drop-down menu for the "Turn off monitor" setting is open.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" setting will be set to "Never".

precondition: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu within the 'Power Options Properties' window is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and 'Never' will be displayed as the selected option for 'Turn off monitor'.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu displays "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
